translations: 梳头发；梳毛（comb 的第三人称单数）

sentences.sentence: He gave Wendy one of their combs.
sentences.translation: 他给了温迪她们梳子中的一把。

sentences.sentence: The queen said, "Only look at my beautiful combs!"
sentences.translation: 王后说：“只要看看我这些漂亮的梳子就行了！”

sentences.sentence: I sold the watch to get your combs.
sentences.translation: 我是卖了金表换了钱给你买发梳。
